title: SGS2 with ICS 4.0.3
comment: Very nice looking widget. Unfortunately does not read dates correctly (thereby invalidating it's own existence on my phone's screen). Selecting some annually repeating events brings up last year's occurrence. Also does not display multiple-day events correctly. I will be waiting for an update. Edit: multiple day events were fixed, one star added. The widget does not display 'all day' events correctly: these events are assigned a date that is one day earlier then what's on the calendar. Also, when tapping on a recurring event on the widget it takes you to the calendar entry that is the first in the series of these events. For example: an all day annually recurring event has been scheduled for Aug 1, with the series starting in 2011; the widget shows it on July 31, 2012, and tapping it's entry takes you to the 2011 entry in the calendar app.

title: Fantastic app!
comment: Very very classy widget. The interface is very nice!

title: Great widget!
comment: A must download. Does as it says and looks great on Jellybean.

title: Spent an hour looking...this is the best
comment: This is, without a doubt, THE best and most usable calendar widget. It displays the info and gets out of the way. Clean. Effective. Beautiful. The icing on the cake is how responsive the dev is!! I just wish that this dev would build more widgets.

title: Perfectly Simple
comment: Very light (60k) and very simple - exactly what I was looking for. Displays the next few upcoming events, and as you scroll down it automatically loads even more future events.

title: Sweet
comment: Feels like the calendar widget that Google should have made. Elegant and fits Holo perfectly. Thanks!

title: Nice calendar widget, but...
comment: ..could do with some more customization options, transparency of the widget etc. But out of the box its very slick :)

title: Recurring events and reminders
comment: I've tried dozens of agenda apps and i really like this one. If it had symbols to identify recurring appointments and those with reminders set, then its 5 stars.

title: Great!
comment: One id like to as for is to implement tasks into it as well!
